Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: ABC Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Rok 1933. Emerytowany belgijski detektyw Herkules Poirot (John Malkovich) stara się wytropić wyrafinowanego seryjnego zabójcę, który wysyła tajemnicze listy podpisane "ABC". Śledczy musi je rozszyfrować, aby odkryć tożsamość niebezpiecznego przestępcy. Wspiera go inspektor Crome (Rubert Grint). Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie - z nominowanym w karierze dwukrotnie do Oscara ("Miejsca w sercu", "Na linii ognia") Johnem Malkovichem.

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La virgen de los sicarios
Matka boska morderców
La Virgen de los sicarios
programme.desc: La virgen de los sicarios: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Germán Jaramillo, Anderson Ballesteros, Juan David Restrepo, Manuel Busquets. The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexis himself is fatally gunned down, grief-stricken Fernando hunts for his young lover's killer in the Medellin slums, but instead encounters Wilmar, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Alexis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250809/","name":"La virgen de los sicarios","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgyZGY1OGYtOTRlMy00OWJhLThjYTItZTcxOTdmMDhiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. At first appalled, he eventually grows addicted to the deaths the boys bring about, their magical ability to resolve the annoyances of everyday life, such as noisy neighbors and aggressive cab subway riders. The film , obviously the product of a philosophically inclined mind (Schroeder studied philosophy at the Sorbonne), is a thinking filmgoer's feast and works on many different levels. programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Joanna Kulig, Adam Woronowicz, Alan Tybulczuk, Eryk Remański, Szymon Kuś

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: Once
Once
programme.desc:
Once: Directed by John Carney. With Glen Hansard, Markéta Irglová, Hugh Walsh, Gerard Hendrick. A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0907657/","name":"Once","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWUxZjJkMDktZmMxMS00Mzg3LTk4MDItN2IwODlmN2E0MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0907657/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chris Knipp"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfecton doesn't have to be perfect","reviewBody":"Once is about a young Irish busker with a torn guitar and a raft of achingly felt songs about a girlfriend he lost the year before. He works in Dublin at his dad's Hoover Repair Centre. One day as he's playing on the street a Czech woman who sells roses and cleans houses comes up and starts to talk to him. She's somewhat cool but she's also disarmingly honest. The dialogue seems understated, offhand, but the words seem to come from the heart. She plays the piano (and later reveals she's written some songs herself) and they get together to make music. Both are suffering from love affairs that went wrong. He longs for her but she keeps her distance. The simplicity of the acting makes the characters seem real, like everything else in the movie. It doesn't try too hard. It trusts its material, and it works.

The recording session they wangle with a group of other buskers (two guitarists and a youthful drummer) is a metaphor for this whole film. These people know nothing about recording, but they've got good material and the initially skeptical engineer winds up acknowledging that they've made a beautiful thing.

Once's transitions are a little awkward sometimes and its images aren't fancy, but the story moves you without having any sentimental payoffs. Kitchen sink film-making: it works if you believe in what you're doing. And have something to work with. The core of Once is the music. It's what they have to work with. The studio recording session has the good feel of things coming together: it's so strong and uncalculated-feeling, it makes the studio scene in Craig Brewer's Hustle and Flow look self-conscious. In Once the sound of the music speaks without special need for dialogue or close-ups. The real love story of Once is the love of musicians playing together. Few movies perhaps have captured any better that warmth and pleasure of making music with others.

People have said this is a musical. If so, it redefines the musical as some American musicals have done recently, especially Spring Awakening and Passing Strange. What makes the idea fly is that it's as if the young man and the young woman can't express what they feel for each other, and the only way they can get their emotions across is to burst into song. But the songs are their songs, not some composer's. It's all perfectly organic.

Perfection, it turns out, doesn't have to be perfect.

Starring Glen Hansard of The Frames and Marketa Irglova.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113416,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-03-23","keywords":"independent film,ireland,payphone,watching tv,song","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275016985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360598/","name":"Glen Hansard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2461627/","name":"Markéta Irglová"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2008013/","name":"Hugh Walsh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018776/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065724/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Callas i Pasolini - historia miłości niemożliwej
programme.desc: Opowieść o współpracy i życiu osobistym dwojga słynnych twórców. Rok 1969. Pier Paolo Pasolini realizuje film, którego fabuła osnuta jest wokół losów Medei. Odtwórczynią roli głównej jest Maria Callas. Wydarzenie to staje się punktem wyjścia do przedstawienia relacji kontrowersyjnego reżysera z największą diwą operową tamtych czasów. Opowiedzą o tym m.in. współtwórcy pamiętnego filmu.

programme.title: Parlez-moi de la pluie
Opowiedz mi o deszczu
Parlez-moi de la pluie
programme.desc:
Parlez-moi de la pluie: Directed by Agnès Jaoui. With Agnès Jaoui, Jean-Pierre Bacri, Jamel Debbouze, Pascale Arbillot. Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings. While she's there, the son (Jamel Debbouze as Karim) of family maid (Mimouna Hadji) takes advantage of her presence and attempts to interview her as part of a documentary about successful women that he's undertaken with his film school teacher, Michel (co-writer Jean-Pierre Bacri). However, Michel's intentions aren't quite what they seem, as he's having an affair with Florence and hoping to persuade her to leave her husband. Meanwhile, Karim finds his own marriage threatened when his attractive hotel co-worker (Florence Loiret-Caille) declares an interest in him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1065332/","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI2MzkwNzY4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTkxMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1065332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stensson"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Talking","reviewBody":"The French are good at it. These conversation movies, there most of the action comes from the talking and there the people only exist through that.

Here we meet the high-heeled Parisian feminist, who according to the rules she keeps, has decided to have a boyfriend, decided to live alone, decided to have no children. A success story, worth a documentary to the old humbug disillusioned film-maker and the younger and more idealistic Karim of Arabian origin. By the way, Karim's mother works as a maiden in the household of the high-heeled feminist's sister.

This is funny and intelligent and not sensational. You won't remember it, but in some ways, you won't forget it either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1795,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-17","keywords":"interview,f rated,life crisis,film shooting,documentarian","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425330457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-centered, workaholic feminist politician grudgingly agrees to take part in a documentary on the subject of Â“successful women.""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069279/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gohatto
Tabu
Gohatto
programme.desc:
Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chi_na_hime_chan"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and thought provoking...","reviewBody":"Even after seeing this movie more than 20 times it still draws me in. Some of the best actors in Japan take part in this flim, most noticeable is Beat Takeshi. The story line is simply jaw dropping. This is the type of film that Hollywood probably wouldn't even dare make. To me the subject matter isn't shocking, but I've spent time in Japan and studied their language and culture extensively, but some people are offended by this. Simply because they cannot get past the little detail that these strong, powerful men can have gay tendencies.

The movie follows Kano Sozaburo as he joins the Shinshigumi (feudal era police). (Also not here that most of the main characters, except Kano and Tashiro are based off actual historical/famous people.) As Kano joins the rank, his beauty and sword skill captivate the men around him, from the other new recruit to the top ranking officers. Suddenly people begin to die, murdered in the night. Any more will give away the story.

IF you get the chance to see this movie do. For some it may be hard to get all the details and understand the little intricacies involved, and the ending may confuse some (especially if you are just going off what the subtitles say). But give it a chance, it's a wonderful film, but not for everyone (and not for the whole family ;)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7419,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-12-18","keywords":"19th century,samurai,japan,rivalry,prostitute","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001429/","name":"Takeshi Kitano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559430/","name":"Ryûhei Matsuda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847487/","name":"Shinji Takeda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007001/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060607/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793050/","name":"Ryôtarô Shiba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano, Koji Matoba, Masa Tommies, Masatô Ibu, Uno Kanda, Kazuko Yoshiyuki

IMDb data; ttnr: 0213682, Title: Gohatto, --- Description: Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chi_na_hime_chan","dateCreated":"2003-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and thought provoking...","reviewBody":"Even after seeing this movie more than 20 times it still draws me in. Some of the best actors in Japan take part in this flim, most noticeable is Beat Takeshi. The story line is simply jaw dropping. This is the type of film that Hollywood probably wouldn't even dare make. To me the subject matter isn't shocking, but I've spent time in Japan and studied their language and culture extensively, but some people are offended by this. Simply because they cannot get past the little detail that these strong, powerful men can have gay tendencies.

The movie follows Kano Sozaburo as he joins the Shinshigumi (feudal era police). (Also not here that most of the main characters, except Kano and Tashiro are based off actual historical/famous people.) As Kano joins the rank, his beauty and sword skill captivate the men around him, from the other new recruit to the top ranking officers. Suddenly people begin to die, murdered in the night. Any more will give away the story.

IF you get the chance to see this movie do. For some it may be hard to get all the details and understand the little intricacies involved, and the ending may confuse some (especially if you are just going off what the subtitles say). But give it a chance, it's a wonderful film, but not for everyone (and not for the whole family ;)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7419,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-12-18","keywords":"19th century,samurai,japan,rivalry,prostitute","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001429/","name":"Takeshi Kitano","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559430/","name":"Ryûhei Matsuda","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847487/","name":"Shinji Takeda"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007001/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060607/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793050/","name":"Ryôtarô Shiba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le jeune Ahmed
Młody Ahmed
Le jeune Ahmed
programme.desc:
Le jeune Ahmed: Directed by Jean-Pierre Dardenne, Luc Dardenne. With Idir Ben Addi, Olivier Bonnaud, Myriem Akheddiou, Victoria Bluck. A Belgian teenager hatches a plot to kill his teacher after embracing an extremist interpretation of the Quran." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8359822/","name":"Le jeune Ahmed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJiNzMzYWQtZmQ1OC00ZDlkLTljNTktMmMxM2JlNzA3NmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NDAyNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Belgian teenager hatches a plot to kill his teacher after embracing an extremist interpretation of the Quran.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8359822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"omeralaa"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A new Islamophobic movie","reviewBody":"At first I want to establish a few things, first that I'm a Muslim person who live in an Islamic country which is Egypt, the second is that I like The Dardennes' cinematic language and I liked (Deux jours, une nuit) so much.

There is no actual plot, the movie is just going nowhere and doesn't follow the three acts structure. The movie is a character study movie but our main character is such a flat, unrealistic and caricature character. How can a kid be like that? How can a kid have this kind of thoughts? How can a kid have this cruelty? How can a kid have this insist on doing this kind of a violent act? It was a flat character who didn't change too much from the beginning to the end. The movie represents the idea of accepting people even if they tried to hurt you, but why did the Dardenne brothers put Muslims as the bad guys? Actually why are we treated as the bad guys from everyone? Bin-Laden? come on look at Hitler or Stallin. Whatever we are the stereotype of violence now so why do I whine.

The Dardenne brothers still have their cinematic tools like the long takes, shaky camera and not using a music. And like I said I liked it in (Deux jours, une nuit) But in this movie actually these tools made the movie slow paced and boring most of the time.

At the end I didn't like the movie at all, It wasn't entertaining and its ideas were biased.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3659,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-05-22","keywords":"classroom,muslim,imam,teacher,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi452115481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RiNjYyN2MtNTdhOC00MmQxLWIwYmItNzE1YjkyMjkxYTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RiNjYyN2MtNTdhOC00MmQxLWIwYmItNzE1YjkyMjkxYTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10712072/","name":"Idir Ben Addi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5672971/","name":"Olivier Bonnaud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4159235/","name":"Myriem Akheddiou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201094/","name":"Jean-Pierre Dardenne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201095/","name":"Luc Dardenne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075922/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201094/","name":"Jean-Pierre Dardenne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201095/","name":"Luc Dardenne"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Szukając Ingmara Bergmana
programme.desc: Sylwetka legendy kina i teatru. Margarethe von Trotta opowiada o dokonaniach szwedzkiego reżysera Ingmara Bergmana. Wnikliwie analizuje najważniejsze sceny z jego filmów, a także kluczowe wątki powtarzające się w całej twórczości autora dramatu "Siódma pieczęć". Von Trotta odnosi się także do miejsc ważnych dla biografii reżysera. W filmie głos zabierają również współpracownicy szwedzkiego mistrza oraz młodsze pokolenie filmowców, dla których dokonania Bergmana są stałym źródłem inspiracji.

programme.title: Piąte: Nie odchodź!
programme.desc: 15-letniej Romie (Michalina Olszańska) umiera matka. Dziewczyna nie może sobie z tym poradzić. Ojciec, wzięty psychiatra Andrzej (Łukasz Simlat), jej tego nie ułatwia, gdyż jest pochłonięty pracą. Nastolatka znajduje ukojenie w intensywnych treningach tańca. Pewnego dnia spotyka małomównego mężczyznę, który wprowadził się do domu w sąsiedztwie.

programme.title: On Chesil Beach
Na plaży Chesil
On Chesil Beach
programme.desc:
On Chesil Beach: Directed by Dominic Cooke. With Billy Howle, Saoirse Ronan, Andy Burse, Rasmus Hardiker. In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1667321/","name":"On Chesil Beach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MjI5OTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIyODc4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1667321/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dave-mcclain"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"layered, profound and affecting","reviewBody":""On Chesil Beach" (R, 1:50) is a drama from first-time feature film director Dominic Cooke (known mainly for helming TV's "The Hallow Crown" and "National Theater Live: A Comedy of Errors"). The screenplay is by British writer Ian McEwan, adapting his own 2007 novella of the same name. The film stars multiple Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Billy Howle - and was released one week after another literary adaptation, "The Seagull", in which the same two actors played young Russian lovers. This story follows two young Brits as they meet, fall in love and get married, focusing mainly on the wedding night.

Florence Pointing and Edward Mayhew have just been married and have arrived at a hotel at the titular beach for their honeymoon. Through an uncomfortable dinner in their room and awkward fumblings with their clothes, it becomes painfully clear that they are equally inexperienced and nervous regarding sex. As the evening slowly progresses, we see flashbacks of how their romance developed, with hints at what makes the prospect of sleeping together so uncomfortable for them - especially Florence. When things come to a head, the young marrieds have a seaside conservation which reveals much about who they are (and the era in which they live) and has very important consequences for the rest of their lives.

"On Chesil Beach" is one of the most layered and most profound movies you are likely to see in 2018. Woven in with the development of the romance, the developments on the wedding night and the repercussions of all of it are themes of sexual repression, gender roles, class differences, pride, regret, communication, forgiveness and, of course, love and marriage. Some will say that not much happens in this film, but there is still a whole lot happenING. And through it all, the considerable acting chops of the two leads (bolstered by solid performances from multiple Oscar nominee Emily Watson, Anne-Marie Duff, Samuel West, Adrian Scarborough and Bebe Cave) make the characters exceedingly sympathetic and relevant. This is a very well-done film without much action, but with plenty to show all of us. "A-"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10575,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"honeymoon,fear of intimacy,year 1962,wedding night,chamber music","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1060223001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNlYjZiNjEtYzFjNS00ZWNlLWFhOTYtOGM1ZDZkZGE3MzRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNlYjZiNjEtYzFjNS00ZWNlLWFhOTYtOGM1ZDZkZGE3MzRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In England, 1962, a young couple finds their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6247071/","name":"Billy Howle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9241204/","name":"Andy Burse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4315078/","name":"Dominic Cooke"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116615/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568605/","name":"Ian McEwan"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1667321/","name":"On Chesil Beach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MjI5OTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIyODc4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1667321/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dave-mcclain","dateCreated":"2018-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"layered, profound and affecting","reviewBody":""On Chesil Beach" (R, 1:50) is a drama from first-time feature film director Dominic Cooke (known mainly for helming TV's "The Hallow Crown" and "National Theater Live: A Comedy of Errors"). The screenplay is by British writer Ian McEwan, adapting his own 2007 novella of the same name. The film stars multiple Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Billy Howle - and was released one week after another literary adaptation, "The Seagull", in which the same two actors played young Russian lovers. This story follows two young Brits as they meet, fall in love and get married, focusing mainly on the wedding night.

Florence Pointing and Edward Mayhew have just been married and have arrived at a hotel at the titular beach for their honeymoon. Through an uncomfortable dinner in their room and awkward fumblings with their clothes, it becomes painfully clear that they are equally inexperienced and nervous regarding sex. As the evening slowly progresses, we see flashbacks of how their romance developed, with hints at what makes the prospect of sleeping together so uncomfortable for them - especially Florence. When things come to a head, the young marrieds have a seaside conservation which reveals much about who they are (and the era in which they live) and has very important consequences for the rest of their lives.

"On Chesil Beach" is one of the most layered and most profound movies you are likely to see in 2018. Woven in with the development of the romance, the developments on the wedding night and the repercussions of all of it are themes of sexual repression, gender roles, class differences, pride, regret, communication, forgiveness and, of course, love and marriage. Some will say that not much happens in this film, but there is still a whole lot happenING. And through it all, the considerable acting chops of the two leads (bolstered by solid performances from multiple Oscar nominee Emily Watson, Anne-Marie Duff, Samuel West, Adrian Scarborough and Bebe Cave) make the characters exceedingly sympathetic and relevant. This is a very well-done film without much action, but with plenty to show all of us. programme.desc: Dialogue avec mon jardinier: Directed by Jean Becker. With Daniel Auteuil, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Fanny Cottençon, Alexia Barlier. A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. He needs someone to make a real vegetable garden again out of the wilderness it has become. The gardener happens to be a former schoolfriend. A warm, fruitful conversation starts between the two men..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0825244/","name":"Dialogue avec mon jardinier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNjYmEwZjItY2FkZS00Y2ZhLTliNjMtZmNlYjY5ZjJjMWJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQzMzQzODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A successful artist, weary of Parisian life and on the verge of divorce, returns to the country to live in his childhood house. The gardener ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0825244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"runamokprods"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sweet, simple story","reviewBody":"For a while, this admittedly talky film (the title is quite accurate, it is mostly conversations) bored me a bit. While the two actors are terrific, the stakes didn't seem very high, and some of the talk seemed too 'easy' in it's wisdom; the working class gardener imparting what's really important in life to the upper-class artist. Not a new concept. \n\nBut this is one of those films that gains it's power by accumulation, and by the end of the film, when life has intervened in more dramatic ways, as it inevitably does, I found myself quite touched, if not deeply moved, and looking back on the whole experience of the film with a wistful fondness.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"gardener,divorce,vegetable,love,southern france","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201669/","name":"Jean-Pierre Darroussin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182946/","name":"Fanny Cottençon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065449/","name":"Jean Becker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0181924/","name":"Jean Cosmos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244089/","name":"Henri Cueco"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Painkillers
Krwawe znieczulenie
Painkillers
programme.desc: Painkillers: Directed by Roxy Shih. With Madeline Zima, Mischa Barton, Naomi Grossman, Debra Wilson. Plagued by guilt following the death of his son in a car crash, John Clarke, a brilliant surgeon comes to realize that the only thing that can ease his pain is the taste of human blood." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6187620/","name":"Painkillers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODkxNTMzMDUtOGNlYi00OTVkLTg5M2MtN2RkNjdiZmRkMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg0MTI3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Plagued by guilt following the death of his son in a car crash, John Clarke, a brilliant surgeon comes to realize that the only thing that can ease his pain is the taste of human blood.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6187620/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviefansme"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addiction sucks","reviewBody":"This movie sounds interesting but is just so mediocre. The plot synopsis might sound like a horror movie, but it's a drama, could be a TV movie of the week (back when that was a thing): John's addicted, watch his life fall apart, albeit in unusual circumstances. Never mind that his addiction is a doozy that no suburban rehab is going to fix, the potentially novel setup rapidly becomes melodramatic. The story so desperately wants to say something but in the end just meanders through the paces-John not knowing what to do, his friends not helping him, and help coming from the wrong places.\n\nThis movie has decent resources-budget, cast, locations-and does so little with it. Many of the set designs were poor, the costuming was off, the characters were unbelievable because the actors had so little to work with. The poster boasts a "special appearance by Mischa Barton" that's nothing special; her agent must've gotten her a hell of a deal for that billing. This must've seemed like a promising project but it just never came together. IMDb data; ttnr: 6187620, Title: Painkillers, --- Description: Painkillers: Directed by Roxy Shih. With Madeline Zima, Mischa Barton, Naomi Grossman, Debra Wilson. Plagued by guilt following the death of his son in a car crash, John Clarke, a brilliant surgeon comes to realize that the only thing that can ease his pain is the taste of human blood." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6187620/","name":"Painkillers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODkxNTMzMDUtOGNlYi00OTVkLTg5M2MtN2RkNjdiZmRkMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg0MTI3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Plagued by guilt following the death of his son in a car crash, John Clarke, a brilliant surgeon comes to realize that the only thing that can ease his pain is the taste of human blood.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6187620/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"moviefansme","dateCreated":"2019-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addiction sucks","reviewBody":"This movie sounds interesting but is just so mediocre. The plot synopsis might sound like a horror movie, but it's a drama, could be a TV movie of the week (back when that was a thing): John's addicted, watch his life fall apart, albeit in unusual circumstances. Never mind that his addiction is a doozy that no suburban rehab is going to fix, the potentially novel setup rapidly becomes melodramatic. The story so desperately wants to say something but in the end just meanders through the paces-John not knowing what to do, his friends not helping him, and help coming from the wrong places.\n\nThis movie has decent resources-budget, cast, locations-and does so little with it. Many of the set designs were poor, the costuming was off, the characters were unbelievable because the actors had so little to work with. The poster boasts a "special appearance by Mischa Barton" that's nothing special; her agent must've gotten her a hell of a deal for that billing. This must've seemed like a promising project but it just never came together. It was nice to see Madeline Zima from Californication in another role, too bad it was in this.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":343,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1,"genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-04-12","keywords":"death","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Painkillers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi740276761","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRlODc3ZTQtOTg1MS00MWUzLWE5MmUtNWFlODE1MWQxN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRlODc3ZTQtOTg1MS00MWUzLWE5MmUtNWFlODE1MWQxN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956526/","name":"Madeline Zima","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059215/","name":"Mischa Barton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1303594/","name":"Naomi Grossman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4367428/","name":"Roxy Shih"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471241/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0396761/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1899712/","name":"Giles Daoust"],"duration":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sugarhouse
Sugarhouse
programme.desc:
Sugarhouse: Directed by Gary Love. With Steven Mackintosh, Ashley Walters, Andy Serkis, Adam Deacon. Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0847526/","name":"Sugarhouse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGM1YzEtNWYwYi00Y2UxLTg0OTMtZmFmY2Q2ZDFmMzg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0847526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BlackNarcissus"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rather Good new Brit Film","reviewBody":"I got an invite to see a Preview screening of Sugarhouse Lane last Wednesday & it was a well attended affair in a Hotel screening Room.

The film is set in London, but not the tourist type London you'll have seen in most British Films. Thankfully there's no shot of 'The Gherkin' building which seems to have plagued all films set in London since around 2000.

Most of the action (if thats the right word) takes place in around a derelict warehouse in/or around a Council estate. D takes Tom to this place in order to do some business but has other plans. Unfortunately this is were the films Stage origins let it down because, the film becomes wordy & rather confined to this single location. The film is beautiful to look at, the DoP should be very proud of themselves. I saw the film in the company of a Film Director and that was a comment he agreed with. Look out for the final Crane shot at the end of the film which is just great..

As to the performances, there's a really great performance from Ashley Walters as D a Crack Addict/Hustler. IMHO it much more than the clichéd "Blackman Druggie" part British Black actors are asked to play. It's a really convincing turn as an addict up there with Willie Ross's Drunk Father in 'Rita, Sue and Bob Too' and Samuel L. Jackson's performance in 'Jungle Fever'. There's also a good performance from Andy Serkis as Hoodwink a Northern Irish hard man. Oh, look out for the girl who plays Hoodwinks girlfriend I think in the titles she's called 'Pregnant Girl'. She's in the film for no more than 5 - 6 minutes tops but there's something really striking about her. 

I must admit I was expecting something different but that said, I was pleasantly surprised. The film is much better than say other films set in London with Urban theme's like 'Breaking and Entering'. A film well worth having a look at when or if it gets a UK Theatrical release.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1293,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-24","keywords":"bully,beating,male full back nudity,bare butt,male nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sugarhouse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2882863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Movie Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533599/","name":"Steven Mackintosh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910180/","name":"Ashley Walters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522327/","name":"Gary Love"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009090/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187060/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2364947/","name":"Dominic Leyton"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 400 Days
400 Days
programme.desc:
400 Days: Directed by Matt Osterman. With Brandon Routh, Dane Cook, Caity Lotz, Ben Feldman. With their 400-day mission simulation nearing completion, 4 astronauts begin to feel something's amiss." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3774790/","name":"400 Days","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk5NzM3MDM3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNjkxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"With their 400-day mission simulation nearing completion, 4 astronauts begin to feel something's amiss.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3774790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing and Frustrating","reviewBody":"The astronauts Theo (Brandon Routh), Emily (Caity Lotz), Dvorak (Dane Cook) and Bug (Ben Feldman) are locked in an underground facility imitating a spaceship for 400 days simulating the travel to a distant planet. The intent is to study the psychological effect caused by the long isolation period without contact or communication with the outside world. They experience hallucinations and weird noises on the outside and close to the day 400, they see a stranger in their ship. When the man flees, Theo and Bug leave the facility and they find outside world dusty, dark and desolate. They decide to walk to seek somebody and while Dvorak believes it is part of the experiment, Theo, Emily and Bug believe that something bad may happen on Earth. 

"400 Days" is an intriguing thriller with an absolutely frustrating conclusion. There are flaws in the story (how a weak man like Bug is selected for such experience is probably the worst) but in general the film builds the mystery with an increasing tension. Unfortunately the lack of conclusion is a cold shower in the viewer. My vote is five.

programme.title: In Her Skin
W jej skórze
In Her Skin
programme.desc: In Her Skin: Directed by Simone North. With Guy Pearce, Miranda Otto, Ruth Bradley, Sam Neill. This is what every parent fears: their child not coming home when they're meant to. When the fifteen-year-old student, Rachel Barber, doesn't climb off the tram to meet her dad, Elizabeth, her mother, and Mike, her dad, bolt into action." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0995851/","name":"In Her Skin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NzIwMDQ3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgyMzA2Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is what every parent fears: their child not coming home when they're meant to. When the fifteen-year-old student, Rachel Barber, doesn't climb off the tram to meet her dad, Elizabeth, her mother, and Mike, her dad, bolt into act","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0995851/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielle_gale"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Powerful movie with a long lasting impression","reviewBody":"This a powerful movie with a long lasting impression. I think Simone did a fantastic job with this story. She kept to the actual events of what happened to Rachel, her family, friends as well as Caroline without glorifying it, sugar coating it and hollywoodising it. It is real and it is raw. This is what happened and this is how the people involved experienced it. The acting is fantastic, the way the scenes flow and the cinematography is excellent. Along with the true story there are messages to take from it, one being involved and recognizing mental illness, as we know is a massive and growing problem in the community.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4878,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"keywords":"missing person,fat girl,obsession,woman murders a woman,young murderer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Her Skin","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1286642969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzU5NDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzI4NDA2NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzU5NDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzI4NDA2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Consumed with self-loathing, nineteen-year-old Caroline covets, stalks, abducts then murders fifteen-year-old Rachel Barber whom she considers "perfect"; everything she is not: beautiful, self-assured, happy. Despite police indifference, Rachel's family mounts a very public campaign to find her. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001584/","name":"Miranda Otto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1094112/","name":"Ruth Bradley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0636066/","name":"Simone North"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234956/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0636066/","name":"Simone North"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Speak
Ucieczka w milczenie
Speak
programme.desc:
Speak: Directed by Jessica Sharzer. With Kristen Stewart, Elizabeth Perkins, Richard Hagerman, Allison Siko. After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0378793/","name":"Speak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg4MzY0NzUzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTE4Mjc2._V1_.jpg","description":"After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0378793/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DaveMcDave"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad at all","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this film and decided that I should say something about it. Firstly, Wow! Kristen Stewart. There is an actress with a great future. An impressive performance. The support cast, which it must be remembered, play a fairly incidental role in this film, were adequate at allowing her to shine through. The Directing was solid. I didn't get lost, it wasn't all over the place. 

Plotwise, I was quietly moved. I had seen this film on cable a couple of times before and just flicked passed it thinking it was just more "made for TV" crapola, but tonight I tuned in at the beginning and failed to channel surf away. I stuck with it till the end, and if anything, was sorry that it was over. It managed to suck me right into the story, I wanted to see where I was being taken. 

It's not a bold film, even though it discusses a challenging topic. I was worried the Teen Angst Engine may kick in, and was glad to see it nowhere in sight. It was a film that left me thoughtful, and wanting to tell someone to give it a chance.... so... give it a chance, I thought it was worth it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25627,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2004-01-20","keywords":"art,high school,teacher,depression,title directed by female","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829576/","name":"Kristen Stewart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001610/","name":"Elizabeth Perkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353527/","name":"Richard Hagerman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0789366/","name":"Jessica Sharzer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133326/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1547881/","name":"Laurie Halse Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0789366/","name":"Jessica Sharzer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1022687/","name":"Annie Young Frisbie"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Iron Invader
Śmiercionośny robot
Iron Golem
programme.desc: Iron Invader: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Kavan Smith, Colby Johannson, Nicole de Boer, Merritt Patterson. Alien bacteria arrives on a meteorite and infects metal, animating a giant iron statue that goes on a killing rampage in a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1651894/","name":"Iron Invader","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGQ4YmJiZDctNzgzMy00MDQwLTlkOWItYTRkM2ZhNzhlZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alien bacteria arrives on a meteorite and infects metal, animating a giant iron statue that goes on a killing rampage in a small town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1651894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cheap 'n' cheesy","reviewBody":"METAL SHIFTERS is another low budget Canadian sci-fi oddity, this one happy enough to copy the likes of THE TERMINATOR and ROBOCOP. Some alien space bacteria comes to earth on a crashed satellite - courtesy of those pesky Russians and in a scene similar to THE BLOB - and has the ability to 'control' metal, shortly animating a random giant robot that just so happens to be hanging around in a scrapyard. What follows is a rampage of destruction.\n\nThe problem with this film is that it's all very family friendly and therefore not at all menacing. I was pleasantly surprised by the calibre of the CGI effects work, which is not to be sniffed at, but otherwise the film is largely dull. Too much of it consists of people running around and the robot getting blown up before joining back together again, and I could do without the family dynamics of the plot. IMDb data; ttnr: 1651894, Title: Iron Invader, --- Description: Iron Invader: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Kavan Smith, Colby Johannson, Nicole de Boer, Merritt Patterson. Alien bacteria arrives on a meteorite and infects metal, animating a giant iron statue that goes on a killing rampage in a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1651894/","name":"Iron Invader","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGQ4YmJiZDctNzgzMy00MDQwLTlkOWItYTRkM2ZhNzhlZDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alien bacteria arrives on a meteorite and infects metal, animating a giant iron statue that goes on a killing rampage in a small town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1651894/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca","dateCreated":"2015-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cheap 'n' cheesy","reviewBody":"METAL SHIFTERS is another low budget Canadian sci-fi oddity, this one happy enough to copy the likes of THE TERMINATOR and ROBOCOP. Some alien space bacteria comes to earth on a crashed satellite - courtesy of those pesky Russians and in a scene similar to THE BLOB - and has the ability to 'control' metal, shortly animating a random giant robot that just so happens to be hanging around in a scrapyard. What follows is a rampage of destruction.\n\nThe problem with this film is that it's all very family friendly and therefore not at all menacing. I was pleasantly surprised by the calibre of the CGI effects work, which is not to be sniffed at, but otherwise the film is largely dull. Too much of it consists of people running around and the robot getting blown up before joining back together again, and I could do without the family dynamics of the plot. Plus there's the usual curse of badly-written characters acted by below-par TV stars, which makes this a less-than-entertaining experience.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"psychotronic film,alien,bar,dousing fire,fire","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Metal Shifters","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4072710425","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5M2FmYjQtNzYxOS00YmU2LTg0OGQtMzZiZDI0YjJmODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5M2FmYjQtNzYxOS00YmU2LTg0OGQtMzZiZDI0YjJmODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Metal Shifters","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0808902/","name":"Kavan Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1145557/","name":"Colby Johannson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0207498/","name":"Nicole de Boer"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0263216/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043355/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1078929/","name":"Gary Hawes"],"duration":"PT1H27M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unknown
Tożsamość
Unknown
programme.desc: Unknown: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones, Aidan Quinn. When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401152/","name":"Unknown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401152/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smith-sherrie22"},"dateCreated":"2012-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lliam is great","reviewBody":"Multiple people have compared this to Neeson's 2008 release of "Taken." Both have a similar concept; Liam goes on a fast-paced journey to retrieve something special that has been taken from him. This time it is not his daughter; it is his mind. Unlike "Taken," "Unknown" is more of a suspense mystery than an action flick. There are some chases and fight scenes, but that is not the main focus. The movie's plot is focus and it is unique for it is unpredictable. We are confused like Neeson's character and there are times we don't know if he will succeed. There are multiple twists and unlike most mystery thrillers, it took me more than half through the film to figure it all out.\n\nIn short, "Unknown" is a fairly decent mystery thriller. Good performances. Good story for a mystery. Good music. Good cinematography—I particularly like the whole gray, dreary atmosphere that reflects the film's location's bleak weather. Good twists. Good suspense— the sound mixers must've had a kick in adding emphasis on sound effects to startle the audience. The one thing I will note is that Liam Neeson is really showing his age. This is not necessarily a bad thing; on the contrary, it helps his character out. It gets tiresome that Hollywood always uses the generic 30-something year old actor with smashing abs who is tossed into a terrible situation. It is nice to see an aging actor play an upper middle-aged man who has perhaps lost his mind while running away from people trying to kill him.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":255393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-03-23","keywords":"amnesia,coma,airport,scientist,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unknown: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 400 Days
400 Days
programme.desc:
400 Days: Directed by Matt Osterman. With Brandon Routh, Dane Cook, Caity Lotz, Ben Feldman. With their 400-day mission simulation nearing completion, 4 astronauts begin to feel something's amiss." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3774790/","name":"400 Days","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk5NzM3MDM3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNjkxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"With their 400-day mission simulation nearing completion, 4 astronauts begin to feel something's amiss.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3774790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing and Frustrating","reviewBody":"The astronauts Theo (Brandon Routh), Emily (Caity Lotz), Dvorak (Dane Cook) and Bug (Ben Feldman) are locked in an underground facility imitating a spaceship for 400 days simulating the travel to a distant planet. The intent is to study the psychological effect caused by the long isolation period without contact or communication with the outside world. They experience hallucinations and weird noises on the outside and close to the day 400, they see a stranger in their ship. When the man flees, Theo and Bug leave the facility and they find outside world dusty, dark and desolate. They decide to walk to seek somebody and while Dvorak believes it is part of the experiment, Theo, Emily and Bug believe that something bad may happen on Earth. 

"400 Days" is an intriguing thriller with an absolutely frustrating conclusion. There are flaws in the story (how a weak man like Bug is selected for such experience is probably the worst) but in general the film builds the mystery with an increasing tension. Unfortunately the lack of conclusion is a cold shower in the viewer. My vote is five.

Title (Brazil): "Protegido: 400 Dias" ("Protected: 400 Days")","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10934,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Mystery","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-01-15","keywords":"no ending,ambiguous,low budget sci fi movie,astronaut,simulation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"400 Days","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2772220441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyZDc2NzUtZjg1Yy00YWYxLThjZTUtY2NiNWYxNDhjYjM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyZDc2NzUtZjg1Yy00YWYxLThjZTUtY2NiNWYxNDhjYjM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"French Trailer for 400 Days"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746125/","name":"Brandon Routh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176981/","name":"Dane Cook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362068/","name":"Caity Lotz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2470867/","name":"Matt Osterman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0366223/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237280/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0328673/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2470867/","name":"Matt Osterman"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="
